content: is there such a thing as  how to say 'hello' website (map)?

Yes, there are websites and maps available that show how to say "hello" in different languages. These websites or maps typically list the word for "hello" along with the pronunciation and sometimes even an audio clip to help you learn the correct pronunciation. These resources can be helpful for travelers or language enthusiasts who want to learn basic greetings in various languages. You can try searching for "how to say hello in different languages" on your preferred search engine to find such websites or maps.
